title: Client Crashing In Champ-Select
body:
So here's my issue:
1. League of Legend client crashes during champion select.
2. I reload client and my friends and I have too wait for it too register I have left even though I re-logged. I want to be in champion select.
3. Finally I get the five minute ban and LP loss if I'm in ranked.

Does anybody know how to fix this problem or even what is causing it?

replies.body:
It could be caused by corrupt game files. Can you try repairing your client and seeing id that resolves the issue?

http://kb.leaguevolunteers.com/tech:repairing_client
